column6: Hot on the heels of last issue's shocking final page, the FF are faced with a two-pronged attack!  Having completed its journey to Earth, the Entity has arrived, warning of an even more terrible threat to come!
column8: | penciller (cover):Jim Calafiore | penciller (cover):Mike McKone | letterer:Randy Gentile | inker:Andy Lanning | writer:Stan Lee | colorist:Paul Mounts
